tool_description: Shopwise transforms your shopping experience with its user-friendly interface and efficient price comparison tools. 🛍️ Get real-time alerts on price drops and exclusive deals, ensuring you always grab the best offers. ⏰ Easily compare prices with barcode scanning for instant, informed purchasing decisions. 🔍 Stay in the loop with user reviews and ratings, guaranteeing quality buys. 🌟 An all-in-one platform, Shopwise saves you time and money, making shopping a breeze. 💰 Download now for a world...
name: Shopwise
title: Shopwise

api_list.name: /searchItem
api_list.description: Retrieve items based on the search query and region

required_parameters.name: itemName
required_parameters.description: Name of the item to search for

required_parameters.name: region
required_parameters.description: The region where the search is conducted (e.g., 'us' for the United States)

buyLink.description: The link to purchase the product

img.description: URL to the image of the product

websiteLogo.description: URL to the logo of the website

offer.description: Any available offers for the product

api_list.name: /latestCoupons
api_list.description: Retrieves the latest available coupons from the specified source, with caching implemented for efficiency
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://shopwise.p.rapidapi.com/latestCoupons"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "shopwise.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://shopwise.p.rapidapi.com/latestCoupons"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "shopwise.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

coupon_Discount.description: The discount amount or percentage offered by the coupon

api_list.name: /barcodeScan
api_list.description: Uses a UPC code and region to search for products on Google Shopping and retrieves relevant product details

required_parameters.name: region
required_parameters.description: The region where the search is conducted (e.g., 'us' for the United States)

required_parameters.name: upcCode
required_parameters.description: The UPC code of the product to search for

buyLink.description: The link to purchase the product

img.description: URL to the image of the product

websiteLogo.description: URL to the logo of the website

offer.description: Any available offers for the product

api_list.name: /productDetails
api_list.description: Fetches product details based on the provided title from Google search results

required_parameters.name: title
required_parameters.description: The title of the product to get details for

api_list.name: /latestDeals
api_list.description: Retrieve the latest deals for a given item in a specified region with optional pagination

required_parameters.name: region
required_parameters.description: The region where the search is conducted (e.g., 'us' for the United States)

required_parameters.name: itemName
required_parameters.description: Name of the item to search for deals

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Number of deals per page for pagination
